mean_cn: n. 弧形物，弧，电弧，弧光
mean_en: a brightly glowing electric current that flows across an open space between two points (such as two electrodes)
short_phrase: an arc in the middle of the city
sentence: The arc of the building in St. Louis really lights up the night sky.
sentence_trans: 在圣路易斯这个建筑的弧光照亮了整个夜空。
